name: What The Box
description:
Tired of waiting Amazon packages that seem to be lost?
Don't worry, a cat will be in charge of recovering it and send it to its destination.
In "What the... Box" you will be able to control that cat and its daily fight against all the complainta that arrive. You will only have to find out what's in the box to send it to its rightful recipient, but don't get it wrong or you will be fired!
